bug.author: ZHyuwind
bug.description: when I train single class, always appear "AssertionError: Target classes exceed model classes", so I want to ask help. Thanks a lot.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ZHyuwind>@ZHyuwind</denchmark-link> your data has classes labelled as greater than 0. Single class can only have class 0 objects.
